text: "She Looks So Perfect" is a 2014 song by Australian band 5 Seconds of Summer and is the leading single from their debut studio album 5 Seconds of Summer. It topped the single charts in Australia, New Zealand, Ireland and the United Kingdom and went to number 24 in the United States. ==Track listing== ;Notes * signifies an additional producer * signifies a vocal producer ==References== Category:2014 songs Category:5 Seconds of Summer songs Category:Power pop songs
title: She Looks So Perfect
